attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen due to the the profits the country as a whole would see from this. Furthermore being the largest medical cannabis distributor in the world it’s hypocritical for the U.K. not to have it legal. Also this would reduce prisons intake and put the police force to better use for more serious offences

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627573
